title: In vivo determination of analgesic and anti-inflammatory activities of isolated compounds from Cleome amblyocarpa and molecular modelling for the top active investigated compounds
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24503-24515
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04496G, Paper

Mayada M. El-Ayouty, Nermeen A. Eltahawy, Ahmed M. Abd EL-sameaa, Ahmed M. Badawy, Khaled M. Darwish, Sameh S. Elhady, Mostafa M. Shokr, Safwat A. Ahmed
Cleome amblyocarpa Barr. and Murb. from the family Cleomaceae is used in folk medicine as it has analgesic, anti-inflammatory, antibacterial and antioxidant activities.
